statements: SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 500;
SELECT gene_name, environmental_factor FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT environmental_factor FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data WHERE environmental_factor = 'Temperature' ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 50 AND environmental_factor = 'Humidity';
SELECT DISTINCT environmental_factor FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY environmental_factor ASC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData ORDER BY species_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 2.0;
SELECT species_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE species_name = 'Human';
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData ORDER BY expression_level ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalFactors WHERE factor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 50 ORDER BY species_name ASC
SELECT MAX(expression_level) AS max_expression_level, species_name FROM GeneExpressionData GROUP BY species_name
SELECT factor_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM EnvironmentalFactors GROUP BY factor_type HAVING count > 1
SELECT species_name, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData GROUP BY species_name ORDER BY avg_expression_level DESC
SELECT gene_id, species_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT factor_name AS FactorName, factor_type AS FactorType FROM environmental_factors;

SELECT gene_name, factor_name, change_description FROM gene_expression_data JOIN evolutionary_changes ON gene_expression_data.gene_id = evolutionary_changes.gene_id JOIN environmental_factors ON environmental_factors.factor_id = evolutionary_changes.factor_id;
SELECT * FROM evolutionary_changes WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT * FROM environmental_factors WHERE factor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, factor_name, change_description FROM gene_expression_data JOIN evolutionary_changes ON gene_expression_data.gene_id = evolutionary_changes.gene_id;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, factor_name, change_description FROM gene_expression_data JOIN evolutionary_changes ON gene_expression_data.gene_id = evolutionary_changes.gene_id WHERE factor_id = 2;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 50 ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 10;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_factors WHERE factor_name = 'Temperature';
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT * FROM environmental_factors WHERE factor_name = 'temperature';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 10 ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM species WHERE species_type = 'mammal' ORDER BY species_name;
SELECT gene_name, factor_name, factor_description FROM gene_expression_data JOIN environmental_factors ON gene_id = factor_id;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData LIMIT 10;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE species = 'Human';
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 1.5 ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalFactors;
SELECT * FROM EvolutionaryChanges WHERE change_type = 'Insertion';
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData ORDER BY gene_name DESC, expression_level ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level, species FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 5;
SELECT gene_name, factor_name, change_type, change_description FROM GeneExpressionData JOIN EvolutionaryChanges ON GeneExpressionData.gene_id = EvolutionaryChanges.gene_id;
SELECT DISTINCT species FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level < 2;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level, species FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE species = 'Human';
